nodes.text: The Aruzans were a sentient species. During the Imperial Era, the Aruzan Manaroo dated the human bounty hunter Dengar.
When Dengar got into trouble in the Vergesso Asteroids, Manaroo contacted a group of spacers and implored them to help her rescue him.

In the new Star Wars canon, an Aruzan was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The species originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was created by Dave Wolverton for the 1996 short story Payback: The Tale of Dengar, which was published in the Tales of the Bounty Hunters anthology.
